languages.text: "Пример презренной Аспис — предостережение нам всем. Даже среди Вольных Торговцев, облеченных властью самим Императором, может расцвести греховное семя".

traits.locale_text: "Пример презренной Аспис — предостережение нам всем. Даже среди Вольных Торговцев, облеченных властью самим Императором, может расцвести греховное семя".
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."
languages.original_text: "Пример презренной Аспис — предостережение нам всем. Даже среди Вольных Торговцев, облеченных властью самим Императором, может расцвести греховное семя".

traits.locale_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of sin can blossom."
traits.speaker: Bishop

traits.locale_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of sin can blossom."
traits.speaker: Bishop

traits.locale_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of sin can blossom."
traits.speaker: Bishop

traits.locale_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of sin can blossom."
traits.speaker: Bishop

traits.locale_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: 「軽蔑に値する人間、アスパイスの実例は私達全員に警告となります。皇帝直々に権利をいただいた自由開拓者であっても、倒錯の種が花開くこともあるのです」
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: 「軽蔑に値する人間、アスパイスの実例は私達全員に警告となります。皇帝直々に権利をいただいた自由開拓者であっても、罪の種が花開くこともあるのです」
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: “阿斯拜丝卑劣的行径，是给我们所有人的警钟。即便是在神皇任命的行商浪人之中，堕落的种子也可能会开花结果。”
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: “阿斯拜丝卑劣的行径，是给我们所有人的警钟。即便是在神皇任命的行商浪人之中，堕落的种子也可能会开花结果。”
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: «El ejemplo de la despreciable Aspyce nos sirve de advertencia a todos. Incluso entre los Comerciantes Independientes, apoderados del mismísimo Emperador, las semillas de la perversión pueden dar fruto».
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: «El ejemplo de la despreciable Aspyce nos sirve de advertencia a todos. Incluso entre los Comerciantes Independientes, apoderados del mismísimo Emperador, las semillas de la perversión pueden dar fruto».
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: « L'exemple de cette misérable Aspyce est un avertissement pour nous tous. La graine de la perversion est capable de s'épanouir partout, même parmi les libres-marchands élus par l'Empereur Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: « L'exemple de cette misérable Aspyce est un avertissement pour nous tous. La graine de la perversion est capable de s'épanouir partout, même parmi les libres-marchands élus par l'Empereur Lui-même. »
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: "Das Beispiel der verachtenswerten Aspyce ist eine Warnung für uns alle. Selbst unter Freihändlern, ermächtigt vom Imperator selbst, kann eine Saat der Perversion keimen."
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: "Das Beispiel der verachtenswerten Aspyce ist eine Warnung für uns alle. Selbst unter Freihändlern, ermächtigt vom Imperator selbst, kann eine Saat der Perversion keimen."
traits.speaker: Bishop

languages.text: "Aşağılık Aspyce emsali, hepimize nasihat olsun. İmparator Hazretleri tarafından yetkilendirilen Hür Tacirler arasında bile sapkınlık tohumu baş verebilir."
languages.original_text: "The example of the contemptible Aspyce is a warning to us all. Even among Rogue Traders, empowered by the Emperor Himself, a seed of perversion can blossom."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağılık Aspyce emsali, hepimize nasihat olsun. Bizzat İmparator tarafından yetkilendirilen Hür Tacirler arasında bile sapkınlık tohumu baş verebilir."
traits.speaker: Bishop
